document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">show </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Durham </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Breast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">her </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">who </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">loves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">best, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Delicious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Robin, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">least </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">within </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Tree </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b454ff">Avowing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Come show thy Durham breast
